queryTemplate: SELECT rt.room_type_name, r.room_public_id, r.room_shorthand, r.room_title, r.room_desc, r.room_welcome, rd.room_data FROM YHTF.YHTF_ROOM r JOIN YHTF.YHTF_ROOM_TYPE rt ON (r.room_type_key = rt.room_type_key) LEFT JOIN YHTF.YHTF_ROOM_DATA rd ON (r.room_key = rd.room_key) WHERE r.room_public_id ~RoomPublicID
